[Section: Page 363 of 1048]



Message 1386 of 4024
I’ll check.
If we are still not in a position for me to see Adrian at that point, and given I waited for a full month for the last plan that has falling through with
nothing on the horizon, I will be beyond disappointed.
Hoping on hope that we stop this and at least make a plan Saturday. We can’t be expected to go on like this and I’d like to resolve amicably. Like I’d
like to figure out even the most basic form of communication.
Sent:02/14/2024 at 11:00 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 11:00 AM)
Subject:Re: AAU
Message 1387 of 4024
The delay has been getting input from Dr Brown which hopefully is moving forward.
It was a real traumatic event that needed to be addressed.
Expressing disappointment is fine but it feels directed at me which is what I hope you did not intend.
Sent:02/14/2024 at 11:02 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 11:02 AM)
Subject:Re: AAU
Message 1388 of 4024
It might be a little. But we can discuss. Dr Brown not only did not do what was outlined. She went further to say she is specifically avoiding doing
that. Given it was your suggestion, and I wanted to work with you, I agreed. I think that was fair. But it’s so far off the rails I have not destination even
in sight.
And I agree that it was traumatizing. It was for you and I both as well. But you and I have been given a small chance at least to discuss. We still disagree
but we can be civil and even see each other. AD has not had that opportunity. He is shut out of both an explanation or what I have apologized for.
The net is it continues to fester. The fact that he can’t get a reasonable explanation from his father just reinforces the idea it was nefarious. I know you
are doing what you think is right, but shutting out one whole side of the story and allowing him to draw his own conclusions seems
counterproductive.
Let’s shine some light on this and let him decide.
Dr Brown has no intention of helping the situation.

Sent:02/14/2024 at 11:11 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 11:12 AM)
Subject:Re: AAU

Message 1389 of 4024
He knows your side as he shared it with me. You shared your story with him. So he does have both his perspective and lived experience and your
explanation.
Dr. Brown is trying to help. I’m not sure where you think she is deviating.
It appears you are linking her in the Yurishka bucket, where all therapists fall, when they raise alarm bells.
Sent:02/14/2024 at 11:14 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 11:15 AM)
Subject:Re: AAU
Message 1390 of 4024
How would he know my side? We have never discussed it at all. I have only said I’d like to.
Please re-read Dr Brown’s mail. It says exactly what I described below. She called it a grey area that she is going to avoid. That is super easy to
understand.
I don’t link her to Yurushka. She had an obligation to talk to you. It’s probably an oath they take?
But she did not have an obligation to say she did not talk to you, when she did.
If this was a police investigation do you really think that would fly? Hell no. She said she did not and did.
None of this matters. If I’m wrong, juts copy paste her plan to address the detailed request we made.
Sent:02/14/2024 at 11:22 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 11:23 AM)
Subject:Re: AAU
Message 1391 of 4024
She is going to talk to us separately to address our plan.

From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 11:24 AM)
Subject:Re: AAU
Message 1392 of 4024
That is not what she said, Christine. If it is please quote. I don’t want this to devolve. Simply show me.
There is no transitive property that because she is talking to us separately, she is doing as we asked.
She specifically says she is not. I even pointed it out in my response to her. Let’s not debate. Show me.
Sent:02/14/2024 at 11:27 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 01:51 PM)
Subject:Re: AAU

Message 1393 of 4024
Let’s give this a rest.
You can’t show me, I know that, so prodding you to do the impossible is not helpful. And when I told you AD and I have never discussed (which is
WAY more important) you did not respond. It has not happened. When could it happen? At a basketball game?
I propose we save the cycles, step away, and focus back on the fact that we need to have a way to work constructively together. Our catch-22’
relationship will only compound and infect even the simplest discussions we have. Let’s focus on that first!
Hopeful you will see fit to agree with the Sat agenda!
Have a great day!

Subject:Re: Still getting alerts

Message 1407 of 4024
First, because this is the 3rd time I have had to type this up because OFW sucks. But it’s all I have.
Second, I have no idea what is going on with my account or the Kirkland Xfinity account now.
I am getting all sorts of alerts from App Access to Credit Cards. I don't know what security layers you have now or what might have changed. I just
know my info is passed around on that network and now I am getting constant warnings and security alerts.
We never had this issue before, so I'm bummed it's exploding now. The net is if we can't figure it out, I need to get any of my info that flows through
your network removed- Kill Max's long time game account, kill all credit card info, kill and game pass connection.
And frankly, that is just to protect me. You can make your own decisions about what you are prepared to put on that network, from all of the above
to your confidential emails and even your every keystroke for that matter. You are in the same boat.
I am not trying to finger-point. I bummed this is happening, but its not your area. I don't expect you to understand. And I am sure that if I did our
taxes for the first time and did not allow you to see what I was filing, I'm sure there would be some hiccups as well.
So please don't take it personally... but not only is it not getting fixed. It is rapidly getting much worse.
Hope your Japan call went well...
Sent:02/14/2024 at 08:21 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 08:53 PM)
Subject:I’m Frustrated
Attachments:IMG_1401.PNG (1 MB)

Message 1408 of 4024

don’t think it’s related to access. I am equally frustrated.

Happy to help any way i can. Xbox is linked to me.

you will take this olive branch and we can make this week a success for the boys, you and I, and our future cooperation. I’m still glad I started with
you instead of Lisa and looking forward to our detente if you allow.

Sent:02/15/2024 at 12:46 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 12:48 PM)
Subject:Re: How is Valentine’s Day?
Message 1423 of 4024
Just answering your questions. I don't care to fight.
For that matter. Given your reaction this morning, I want to respect your position and don't care to communicate much anymore. You said we both
wanted peace and explained what it would take to get to normalcy. I tried for almost two weeks, and you were mostly pleasant in OFW for which I
appreciate. But we got nothing done, no olive branch, and today we only got worse. I feel like Charlie Brown and Lucy kicking the football. You can
Google it...
But you asked about the cams that you sent over with the exact same mounts (one single, one none) you said you never knew existed and if they did,
you never knew about them. I won't disagree with you. I just saw you had packed them away and eventually sent them to me. I won't confirm or deny
you knew of them. You just handled them. I gave you the ring for xmas. I did not install it. The others were set up but were not reliable or all that
useful. We took the white indoor cams down, you put the away, but left the outdoor cams up as a deterrent.
- Sending a pic of the Amazon purchase before Xmas in 2020. Install date is unknown tbh.
- Sharing a pic of the outdoor cams, please note how the mounts match the newer ones.
At the risk of repeating myself, I am not saying you knew but you asked two questions I'd like to offer my thoughts on.
One: "If we had them, why didn't I have the Blink App installed?"
I don't know. If you say you never installed it I believe you. I had it, they did a shitty job so perhaps we stopped using them before you even needed to.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 01:47 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 02:42 PM)
Subject:Your Questions This AM
Attachments:Amazon_Screen_Purchases.jpg (261 KB)
image_50434817.JPG (1 MB)

You never installed the Beach Cams either. But I had shared them with you (indoor and outdoor) and knew those worked, but never installed the app
for those.
That said, you also never installed:
- Nest App- It works well, you are aware of it, and never installed it, but ask me to use it for you.
- Sleep Number App- It is also helpful but you never installed it. But maybe just did not need to.
- Frame Apps- We had them in the living room and used them daily. You choose not to install.
- Samsung App- It sets the picture you see in the cat room and bedroom. You did not install.
- Alexa- You still have several cam/audio devices that can drop in on me. Not sure what's up.
When we were a loving couple doing our own thing, lots of times I would be geeked out on something, you would smile and nod, feign interest but
not really act. That was normal.
Two: "If we had them, I would have remembered them?"
I don't have any reason to believe you would not, so this may be true too. And I won't fight if you really believe that you have no memory of that. I
will say that we do forget things sometimes, however. Everyone does.
This could be a long list, but you will get the point:
Carbon Monoxide Detector- I made a pretty big deal of this, explaining that I always am sure to take them on vacation with us. I talked about why I
do that and all the crazy AirBnB stories that made me scared. I wanted to protect our family and noted that I would be taking it to protect your
brother along with Justin and Josh. For some reason, it was being used as a WiFi repeater in your clear line of the site where you spend hours every
week. Maybe you forgot?
Private Moments- I asked you recently if you remember our Hyatt stay. You didn't. This surprised me. It was one of the few times we made time for
an overnight together. In the end, we bickered on the way home, but that night, and especially the morning, was an all-time great freaking sweaty, sexy
time. WOW!! And.. we took crazy explicit pics of you. By far the hardest core thing we ever did. Face and all. I won't attach pics. I would think you
would remember, but don't.
My point is everyone forgets things but believes they are absolutely in command of the facts. I have even watched Netflix documentaries on it. It is
called the "eyewitness memory distortion " effect. It's a fascinating human phenomenon and it's super interesting to see it broken down and explained.
That said, who knows, maybe I did not even mention it to you. I may be guilty of the same thing and thought I told you but didn't. But like the
"Alexa drop in" we used often at times; it was just normal when we were a happy family. We did not think of it as spying.
This is of course equally true of:
- Our shared ATT family plan
- Parental control for the kids
- Screen time alerts for the kids
- New device joining Xfinity alerts
I don't really care about what the Luddites in the family law world or the perversion of good intentions into bad, that this has become. When we were
a happy family, this was all approved, discussed, and, welcomed. Protecting your kids in the real world is expected. And phone bills have had call/text
history since long before cell phones even existed.
You didn't ask about things rejoining the network today or about alerts that pop like Blink did. But you have seen them with Samsung Alerts. So, at a
minimum, you have to realize this is a true and demonstratable network phenomenon. I can also prove beyond a shadow of a doubt that the cams DO
NOT work in the places you saw them, in the open, pointing at exterior doors.
At this point, I have digressed. But you asked two questions about the cams, and I wanted to give you, my thoughts. If in reading this, you think that
it is simply impossible that what I am saying could ever be true, that's you right. I am only offering my true and honest perspective on the event that
has traumatized you, because I never had any desire to surveil you.... ever.
As mentioned, many times before I am happy to prove this to you in front of your eyes. I have also told you that I bought the new ones at the

Northgate Target and the Blink account was deleted when I realized what it was doing. I wish I could have shown you everything the moment I
realized this was happening when I cam over the next day. But we are where we are.
Maybe someday we come to terms with all this, but I'm not hopeful anymore. No dialog or shared exchange of perspectives will only entrench and
increase the hate for one another.
Message 1424 of 4024
I appreciate you responding to my questions below with that level of detail.
One thing that really jumped out for me, and now I am terrified of, given the volatility of the situation, and past threats, is mention of explicit pictures
with my face on them.
I am going to ask you destroy those. Please confirm once that is done.
When reading the different forms and options, pics, videos and other images of a sexual nature, that could be used as a weapon, could be ordered
deleted.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 02:49 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 02:49 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM
Message 1425 of 4024
So... I wanted to let you know after I sent this.
I destroyed all the face, tattoo pics and couple of years ago. You were my wife. I had the real thing whenever I wanted. And I wanted to protect you.
Hacking happens (juts like the last few days) I would never let my Queen be tarnished.They have been long gone.
I will also delete the anonymous ones. I have not looked at them in two years.I have no issues with that. I do want the undie ones that don’t show
anything more than your amazing body and what anyone would see at the beach. Let me know if that is an issue. I’d like those maybe?
What forms and options are you reading about how to come after me if I may ask? I’m not doing any of that. I’m trying to focus on improving us but
you won’t I guess maybe I should stop and light a fire with Lisa. Tell her we need to stop playing nice and start preparing for a frontal assault because
my efforts to heal wounds and co-parent are in vain.
My hope was we could work this out and move on with grace and respect, but not a single hope has materialized. You say I have, and will beat my kids
again. Realistically I assume you might say anything. Perhaps sexual molestation is next. It would be just as true as me beating them and pack an even
more lethal punch for ya.
I have zero desire to cause you harm. I have shown that. I never surveilled you but you won’t even consider if what I have said could even possibly be
true. And it definitely can and I can show you. But you refuse to even watch a real life demonstration. You seem dead set on not even considering an
alternative explanation for the cams or the physical abuse claims you levied against me.
In your heart. Like really deep down below all the hate and willful destruction you have for me, you know, the kids know, the world knows I never
beat you or my kids. To sign your name on a legal document saying that is nuts. Yet that is what you have alleged to god and everyone, including the
courts and police. You don’t think that perhaps, at this point you and Anna Lisa have taken my persecution too far yet?
I watched a show the other day about a wife who alleged the same thing on her husband for custody like you are doing now. She moved to sexual
Sent:02/15/2024 at 03:17 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 04:57 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM

molestation eventually. As you might do soon. It took years, jail time, and drug the children through hell. And it all never happened. Ot destroyed
innocent lives. But apart from sex abuse, we are no different. It’s playing out the exact same way so far.
And please, don’t act like you are not capable of that. It’s insulting to us both with your signature sitting on a legal document with the court and
police department alleging that I beat my family. It’s just the other side of the same coin you have already used.
Message 1426 of 4024
Confirmed. Have at me.
My point was sometimes we think we remember big things. But we don’t. That seems bigger than just the cams around the house when all was good.
Since you didn’t, do you think it’s possible you didn’t? Because it might be the case. Or are you so sure you will destroy me and take the boys father
away.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 03:38 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 04:59 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM
Message 1427 of 4024
Thank you for confirming you have deleted the pictures. That is a huge relief for me.
My hope is that one day you might recognize my perspective on what unfolded and how I’m just trying to do the right thing by myself and the kids. I
didn’t for many years and the harm it caused to me and them, I can’t take back. I own that.
We both need peace.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 05:28 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 05:55 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM
Message 1428 of 4024
As an FYI-
Sharing two of the live cams you have had in my place since the beach days. You also had one on your desk but not sure what it was used for, but
know it acts as the receiver for watching video and listening for audio. I didn't know about them so moved them from Alki to Bellevue thinking they
were innocent. I still assume they are, but want to confirm.
But both have drop-in enabled. So as we have done so many times in the past, you can just "drop in" unannounced and see and hear everything that
goes on in the most private spaces of my home, not outside in public view where the expectation of privacy is far different. These were great when we
needed them for a quick check in on the kids.
Then of course, a bunch more (registered to you, again) came over recently that if I plug in, can also monitor audio and video via drop-in. That is
actually how I found out about the other two that were in my place for who knows how long. I drilled into who they were currently registered to and
what they were capable of.
Sent:02/15/2024 at 05:55 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/15/2024 at 06:29 PM)
Subject:Re: Your Questions This AM
Attachments:image_123650291__10_.JPG (269 KB)
image_123650291__9_.JPG (289 KB)

I want to be helpful and hope after all of this mess on my, you are not using these "drop-in" devices for anything nefarious. Or trying to sneak in new
digital trojan horses, but you see what I see and have shared. So, they could all be used to spy on me if you want, its just a question of if you are using
them. And again- I honestly do not think you are.
This was one of the core reasons I tried to open a dialog with you this week. It is in the emails I sent and on the list you asked me to document of
things to discuss. I don't believe this is intentional, especially after all we have struggled with in this area. And that's why I wanted it to stay between
us. I totally give you the benefit of the doubt here.
So let me know how would like to proceed given we can't communicate peacefully. I still want to resolve this constructively, but I'm stuck between a
rock and a hard place if I can't even talk to you about it. And I am NOT making any threats. I am NOT coming after you for cameras in my place. I
am looking to resolve this and prefer not to go through attorneys.
